title: Digital navigation support
summary: Close broadband/device gaps driving adherence issues.
actions: Enroll member in low-cost internet/device program | Schedule telehealth coaching to build portal fluency

title: Care access concierge
summary: Improve access to clinics and reduce appointment drop-off.
actions: Arrange ride-share or mobile clinic visit | Proactively co-schedule PCP + SDOH wraparound visit

title: Transportation stipend
summary: Offset long commutes impacting visit adherence.
actions: Issue monthly transit vouchers or fuel card | Bundle remote monitoring kit to limit site visits

title: Transportation stipend
summary: Offset long commutes impacting visit adherence.
actions: Issue monthly transit vouchers or fuel card | Bundle remote monitoring kit to limit site visits

title: Transportation stipend
summary: Offset long commutes impacting visit adherence.
actions: Issue monthly transit vouchers or fuel card | Bundle remote monitoring kit to limit site visits

title: Same-day pharmacy delivery
summary: Solve last-mile barriers when transportation is limited.
actions: Enable courier/mail delivery for maintenance meds | Bundle meds with adherence packaging for easy dosing

title: Food security referral
summary: Stabilize nutrition to support medication adherence.
actions: Auto-refer to local pantry and SNAP navigator | Enroll in medically tailored meals pilot

title: Housing stabilization support
summary: Reduce instability to prevent risk spikes.
actions: Partner with housing nonprofit for rental assistance | Add community health worker visits for tenancy coaching

title: Medication affordability concierge
summary: Remove copay barriers and keep fills on time.
actions: Enroll member in manufacturer copay/340B savings | Swap to 90-day low-cost formulary alternative when possible

title: Medication affordability concierge
summary: Remove copay barriers and keep fills on time.
actions: Enroll member in manufacturer copay/340B savings | Swap to 90-day low-cost formulary alternative when possible

title: Medication affordability concierge
summary: Remove copay barriers and keep fills on time.
actions: Enroll member in manufacturer copay/340B savings | Swap to 90-day low-cost formulary alternative when possible

title: Medication literacy coaching
summary: Boost understanding of therapy importance and timing.
actions: Pharmacist-led teach-back session focused on regimen | Provide bite-sized digital reminders and plain-language tip sheets

title: Shift-friendly pharmacy outreach
summary: Accommodate work instability that disrupts refills.
actions: Offer after-hours pharmacist callback or text refill approvals | Auto-enroll in mail delivery with flexible drop windows

title: Peer adherence ambassador
summary: Address isolation with supportive accountability.
actions: Pair member with community health worker for weekly touchpoints | Invite member to virtual medication coaching circle

title: Home environment safety kit
summary: Reduce environmental triggers that derail therapy.
actions: Mail air-quality or pill-storage kits to stabilize meds | Coordinate nurse visit to review safe medication storage

title: Telepharmacy check-ins
summary: Bring pharmacy coaching to rural members virtually.
actions: Schedule monthly video adherence visit | Ship smart devices if member lacks equipment

title: 90-day medication synchronization
summary: Align all chronic meds to a single refill date.
actions: Convert eligible meds to 90-day mail order | Activate automatic refill reminders tied to sync date

title: Smart adherence packaging
summary: Use blister packs or dispensers to prevent missed doses.
actions: Enroll in pill-pack service with AM/PM labeling | Provide dispenser with text/app alerts when doses are missed

title: Real-time refill alerting
summary: Proactively escalate when refills are overdue.
actions: Trigger IVR/SMS nudges 3 days prior to run-out | Route late fills to pharmacist outreach queue

title: Behavioral adherence coaching
summary: Blend motivational interviewing with HEDIS education.
actions: Schedule pharmacist MI session focused on beliefs about meds | Set shared adherence goals tied to STAR incentives

title: Same-day pharmacy delivery
summary: Solve last-mile barriers when transportation is limited.
actions: Enable courier/mail delivery for maintenance meds | Bundle meds with adherence packaging for easy dosing
